author: vlimant
body:
#### PR description:

While looking into #39197 it seems that CondDBESSource dumps in cout, which is, as a comment in the code says "not optimal".
I propose to dump the information in the framework job report with this PR

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py --what nano --site "" --command '--number 5 --customise_commands "process.GlobalTag.DumpStat=cms.untracked.bool(True)"' -l 2500.332 --job-report`

and I was able to see the entries in the job report.
title: a proposal for dumping the info in fwk jobreport
